channel.title: Photography on Lyon's Field Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on Lyon's Field Notes

item.title: Monument Valley, AZ
item.description: I arrived late in the evening at Monument Valley, tired from the long drive from Bryce Canyon. I pitched my tent on a narrow strip of sand next to the Navajo visitor centre car park, and fell asleep. I woke at dawn to this view—the iconic backdrop of the cowboy movies of my childhood. I felt the usual prickle of not-quite-recognition that attended much of my drive round the US that year.
